name: WorkflowClientAdminService
title: Workflow Client Admin Service

description: Workflow Requirements for Client Admin Service

statement.label: requirement-541
statement.requirement:
Informative: Consent Client and Consent Administration Service generally follow the subscription workflow for R4 systems in section 2.3.3

All constituent parts of this workflow are normatively defined elsewhere. Will use this workflow as a basis for the test cases needed.
